content: marker sm slip marker sst seed stitch alternating each round with a knit on top of a purl and a purl on top of a knit in the 8 stitch seed stitch pattern in the knit it looks like this k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 p1 k1 work in pattern continue to work the rounds in the pattern you have established - knit the stitches you knit the previous round and do the seed stitch pattern for the 8 stitches where you ve established seed stitch seed stitch mittens - version 2 1 copyright made by matsy 2019/2024 page 4 of 4
